Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Mummy mask
Description: Mummy mask with a grey face and black and white eyes.The front of the wig is not decorated. The mask is adorned with a necklace. A winged scarab(?) is visible on the top of the head, as are two winged goddesses on the sides. At the back, the knot of the headband is shaped like the sign sa. The sign kheker was drawn below.
